summary: A set of SOCKS proxy plugins for the NTLMRelayX tool, each implementing the handling and forwarding of a specific network protocol (e.g., HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, MSSQL, SMB, SMTP). They manage connection establishment, optional authentication, SSL wrapping, and bidirectional data tunneling to enable NTLM relay attacks through a SOCKS interface.
business_intent: To empower security professionals and penetration testers with the ability to relay various protocol traffic via NTLM relay attacks, facilitating credential harvesting and lateral movement across target networks.
